targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(date), sum(m_visits)
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY date

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL $time_shift DAY), sum(m_visits)
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
GROUP BY date

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits' as Visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Page Views / Visits')), 'Page Views / Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Page Views / Visits' as pi_visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Time spent / Visit in s')), 'Time spent / Visit in s')
FROM(
SELECT 'Time spent / Visit in s' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum

SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum

SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum

SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum

SELECT
  SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum

SELECT
    SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM
    Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum

WITH past_value as(
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
  site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum), current_value AS (
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as current_sum
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as past_sum,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
  site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum), current_value AS (
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as current_sum,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
SELECT 
   SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS past_sum,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND $Vergleichszeitraum), current_value AS (
SELECT 
   SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS current_sum,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND $Zeitraum
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

SELECT
  publishing_date as Datum,
  content_titel as Artikel,
  sum(m_visits) as Visits,
  sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
  content_id_sophora,
  '' as Type
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      --publishing_date,
      FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
      FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
      m_visits,
      m_page_loads,
      FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER ( PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel
    FROM
      $table
    WHERE
      site_level2 = '${app_name}'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
      AND (
        CASE 
            WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN
                content_titel NOT LIKE '%Video Livestream%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%Startteaser%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%startteaser%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%-Anmelden%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%_Start'
            AND content_titel != 'Anmelden'
            AND content_titel != 'Jetzt luft'
        ELSE
          TRUE
        END)
      AND $Zeitraum
  )
GROUP BY
  content_id_sophora,
  content_titel,
  publishing_date
ORDER BY
  3 DESC
LIMIT
  100

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), os_group 
FROM 
  Piano.distro
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
  AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
GROUP BY os_group
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
device_type,
SUM(m_visits) as visits
FROM
Piano.distro
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum 
  AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
GROUP BY device_type 
ORDER BY visits DESC 
LIMIT 10

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "Vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

current.text: date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
current.value: date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND date <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

SELECT distinct LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App`
ORDER BY LRA ASC

SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN 1
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END

SELECT distinct app FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY app ASC

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN "$LRA" = 'MDR' THEN
      (SELECT distinct product_app_name FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App` WHERE app = "$App")
    WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN 
      (SELECT distinct site_level2 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App` WHERE app = "$App")
  END

current.value: date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: date >= (SELECTsaturdayFROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday)
date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()
date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Heute : date = CURRENT_DATE(), Gestern : date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende : date >= (SELECTsaturdayFROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday), Letzte 7 Tage : date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_today"
  ELSE "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_daily"
END
